section.name: Schemes
section.p: The jPBC distribution package contains also the implementations of the following cryptosystems in the context of the Bouncy Castle framework. This will simplify the integration with the Java Cryptography Extension (JCE) framework.

ol.li: [W'12] : B. Waters, Functional Encryption for Regular Languages
[LW'11] : A. Lewko and B. Waters, Unbounded HIBE and Attribute-Based Encryption.
[LOSTW'10] : A. Lewko and T. Okamoto and A. Sahai and K. Takashima and B. Waters, Fully Secure Functional Encryption: Attribute-Based Encryption and (Hierarchical) Inner Product Encryption.
[DIP'10] : A. De Caro and V. Iovino and G. Persiano, Fully Secure Anonymous HIBE and Secret-Key Anonymous IBE with Short Ciphertexts.
[IP'08] : V. Iovino and G. Persiano, Hidden-Vector Encryption with Groups of Prime Order.
[IBS'06] : K. G. Paterson and J. C. N. Schuldt, Efficient Identity-based Signatures Secure in the Standard Model.
[BLS'01] : D. Boneh, B. Lynn, and H. Shacham., Short signatures from the Weil pairing.
[BDP'10] : C. Blundo and A. De Caro and G. Persiano, Untraceable (RIFD) Tags based on Mild Assumptions.
